snippet: Of makeovers at postal services, SingPost’s is among the most ambitious. Besides regular postal duties, it offers a basket of services for companies, including website development, online marketing, customer service and, of course, package...
abstract: Of makeovers at postal services, SingPost’s is among the most ambitious. Besides regular postal duties, it offers a basket of services for companies, including website development, online marketing, customer service and, of course, package delivery.

headline.main: Daily Report: In Singapore, the Post Office Evolves for E-Commerce
